Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Data accuracy rate within the PDM system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of accurate data entries in the Product Data Management (PDM) system relative to total data entries.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Accurate Data Entries / Total Data Entries * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Number of products managed per PDM user.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average number of products managed by each user in the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Products / Total Number of PDM Users

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Score evaluating the completeness of product data entries, including all required fields and accuracy.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Complete Data Entries / Total Data Entries * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Time taken to update product data.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to make updates to product data in the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time to Update Data (Time Taken for Updates / Number of Updates)

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Percentage of products with updated specifications.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of products that have their specifications updated in accordance with current standards and requirements.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Number of Products with Updated Specifications / Total Number of Products * 100

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Percentage of time the Product Data Management (PDM) system is operational and available for use.

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.KPIS: Number of data integration issues resolved.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Total number of issues related to data integration that are successfully addressed and resolved.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Total Number of Data Integration Issues Resolved

Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.EXPLANATION: Average time required to retrieve product data from the Product Data Management (PDM) system.
Product Development+Product Lifecycle Ma.FORMULA: Average Time to Retrieve Product Data
